yu~jjatE mana# uta yu~jjatE̍ dhiyaḥ|viprA̍ viprasya̍ bRuhatO vipaścita̍ḥ|vi̍ hOtrA# dadhE vayunAvidEka it|mahI dEvasya# savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ||dEvasya̍# tvA savituḥ prasavE|aśvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱m|pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmAdadE||aBri̍rasi̍ nArirasi|addhvarakRud-dEvEBya̍ḥ|utti̍ṣṭha̍ brahmaṇaspatE|2 (10)

maKAya# tvA|maKasya# tvA śIrṣṇE||Ayur̍ dhEhi prAṇam dhEhi|apAnam̍ dhEhi̍ vyAnam dhEhi|cakṣu̍r̍ dhEhi śrOtraM̍ dhEhi|manO# dhEhi vAcaM̍ dhEhi|AtmAnaM̍ dhEhi pratiṣṭhAM dhEhi|mAM̍ dhEhi̍ mayi# dhEhi||madhu# tvA madhulA karOtu|maKasya̍ śirO&si̍ ( )|6 (10)

yajñasya# padE sthaḥ|gAyatrEṇa̍# tvA CandasA̍ karOmi|traiṣṭuBEna̍ tvA CandasA̍ karOmi|jAgatEna̍ tvA CandasA̍ karOmi||maKasya rAsnA&si|adi̍tistE̍ bila~ggRuhṇAtu|pA~gktE̍na̍ CandasA|sUrya̍sya̍ harasA̍ śrAya|maKO&si||7̍ (9) śpecial Korvai (iyati̍ dEvIrindrasyaujO̱&syagnijA asyAyurddhEhi̍ prAṇam pa~jca)̍

vRuṣṇO aśvasya̍ niṣpadasi|varu̍ṇastvA̍ dhRutavrata̍ AdhUpayatu|mitrAvaru̍ṇayOr̍ dhruvEṇa dharmaṇA||arciṣE̱̍ tvA|śOciṣE̱ tvA|jyOtiṣE̍ tvA|tapasE̍ tvA||aBImam mahinA̍ diva̱m|mitrO baBUva̍ saprathA̱ḥ|uta śravasA̍ pRuthivIm|8 (10)

mitrasya# caṛṣaṇIdhRutaḥ|śravO̍# dEvasya# sAnasim|dyumna~jcitraśravastamam||siddhyai̱̍ tvA|dEvastvA# savitOdvapatu|supAṇiḥ̍ sva~gguriḥ|subAhuruta̍ śaktyA̱||apadyamAnaḥ̍ pRuthivyAm|AśA diśa A pRuṇa|utti̍ṣṭha̍ bRuhan Bava|9̍ (10)

Urddhvastiṣṭha̍ dhruvastvam||sUryasya̍ tvA cakṣuṣA&nvI̱kṣE|RujavE̱ tvA|sAdhavE̱ tvA|sukṣityai tvA BUtyai̱ tvA||idamahamamumAmuṣyAyaṇaM̍ ~MviśA paśuBir̍ brahmavarcasEna paryUhAmi|gAyatrEṇa̍# tvA CandasA &&cCRuṇadmi|traiṣṭu̍BEna̍ tvA CandasA &&cCRuṇadmi|jAga̍tEna̍ tvA CandasA &&cCRuṇadmi|CRuṇattu̍# tvA vAk ( )|CRuṇattu tvOrk|CRuṇattu# tvA haviḥ|CRundhi vAca̱m|CRundhyUrja̱m|CRundhi haviḥ||dEva# puraścara saGyAsantvA||10̍ (16)

brahman̍ pravargyEṇa̍ pracariṣyAmaḥ|hOta̍r̍ GarmamaBiṣṭuhi|agnIdrauhi̍ṇau̍ purOḍAśAvadhiśraya|prati̍prasthAtarviha̍ra|prastO̍taḥ̍ sAmAni̍ gAya||yajuryuktaṃq̍ sAmaBirAkta̍KantvA|viśvai̱r̍ dEvairanumatam̍ marudBiḥ|dakṣi̍ṇABiḥ̍ pratatam̍ pArayiṣṇum|stuBO# vahantu sumanasyamAnam|sa̍ nO rucandhEhyahRu̍ṇIyamAnaḥ̍ ( )|BUrBuvassuvaḥ|Omindra̍vantaḥ̍ pracarata||11̍ (12)

brahman pracariṣyAmaḥ|hOta̍r̍ GarmamaBiṣṭuhi||yamAya̍# tvA maKAya# tvA|sUryasya̍ harasE̍ tvA||prAṇAya svAhA̱ vyAnAya svAhA# &pAnAya svAhA̱|cakṣuṣE̍ svAhA śrOtrAya̍ svAhA̱|manasE̍ svAhA# vAcE sarasvatyai̍ svAhA̱|dakṣAya̍ svAhA kratavE̍ svAhA̱|OjasE̍ svAhA balAya̍ svAhA̱||dEvastvA# savitA maddhvA&naktu|12̍ (10)

pRuthivIM tapasastrAyasva|arcira̍si̍ śOcirasi̍ jyOtirasi̍ tapO&si|saṃsI̍dasva̍ mahAṃ asi|śOca̍sva̍ dEvavItamaḥ|vi̍ dhUmamagnE̍ aruṣam miyEddhya|sRuja̍ praśasta̍ daṛśatam||a~jjanti yam prathayantO̍ na viprA̱ḥ|vapAvantannAgninA̍ tapantaḥ|piturna̍ putra upasi̍ prEṣṭhaḥ|A̍ GarmO agnimRutayannasAdIt||13̍ (10)
anAdhRuṣyA purastA̱t|agnErAdhipatyE|Ayu̍rmE̍ dAḥ|putravatI̍ dakṣiṇataḥ|indrasyAdhipatyE|prajAm̍ mE# dAḥ|suṣadA# paścAt|dEvasya# saviturAdhipatyE|prAṇam̍ mE# dAḥ|Aśrutiruttarataḥ|14̍ (10)

mitrAvaruṇayOrAdhi̍patyE|śrOtra̍m̍ mE dAḥ|vidhRutirupari̍ṣṭAt|bRuhaspatErAdhi̍patyE|brahma̍# mE dAḥ kṣatram mE# dAḥ|tEjO# mE dhA varcO# mE dhAḥ|yaśO# mE dhA stapO# mE dhAḥ|manO# mE dhAḥ||manOraśvA&si̍ BUriputrA|viśvA̱ByO̍ mA nAṣṭrAByaḥ̍ pAhi|15 (10)

sUpasadA# mE BUyA mA mA# hiṃsIḥ||tapO ṣvagnE̍ antarAṃ̍ amitrAn|tapAśaṃsa̍mararuṣaḥ̍ parasya|tapA̍# vasO cikitAnO acittAn|vi̍ tE# tiṣṭhantAmajarA# ayAsaḥ||cita̍ḥ̍ stha paricitaḥ|svAhA̍# marudBiḥ pariśrayasva|mA̍ asi|pramA̍ asi|pratimA̍ asi|16̍ (10)

sammA asi|vimA̍ asi|unmA̍ asi|antari̍kṣasyAntarddhira̍si||divantapa̍sastrAyasva|ABir̍ gIrBir yadatO# na Unam|ApyAyaya̍ harivO varddhamAnaḥ|yadA̍ stOtRuByO mahi# gOtrA rujAsi|BUyiṣṭhaBAjO̍ adha# tE syAma||śukrantE# anyad yajatantE̍# anyat|17 (10)

viṣurUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyaurivAsi|viśvA̍ hi mAyA avasi̍ svadhAvaḥ|BadrA tE# pUṣanniha rAtirastu||aṛha̍n̍ biBaṛṣi sAyakAni̍ dhanva|aṛha̍nniṣkaM̍ ~MyajataM̍ ~MviśvarUpam|aṛha̍nnidaM̍ dayasE̍ viśva-mabBuvam|na̍ vA OjIyO̍ rudra tvadasti||gAyatrama̍si|traiṣṭu̍Bamasi|jAga̍tamasi̍ ( )|madhu madhu madhu||18̍ (11)

daśa prAcIrdaśa# BAsi dakṣiṇA|daśa# pratIcIrdaśa# BAsyudIcIḥ|daśOrddhvA̍ BAsi̍ sumanasyamAnaḥ|sa̍ nO rucandhEhyahRu̍ṇIyamAnaḥ||agniṣṭvA̍ vasuBiḥ̍ purastA̱d-rOcayatu gAyatrEṇa CandasA|sa̍ mA# rucitO rOcaya||indra̍stvA̍ rudrair-dakṣiṇatO̍ rOcayatu̍ traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA|sa̍ mA# rucitO rOcaya|varu̍ṇastvA&&dityaiḥ̍ paścAd-rOcayatu̍ jAgatEna̍ CandasA|sa̍ mA# rucitO rOcaya|19̍ (10)

dyutAnastvA# mArutO marudBiruttaratO̍ rOcayatvAnu̍ṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA|sa̍ mA# rucitO rOcaya|bRuhaspati̍stvA̍ viśvai̱r dEvairupariṣṭAd-rOcayatu̍ pA~gktEna̍ CandasA|sa̍ mA# rucitO rOcaya||rOcitastvam̍ dEva̍ Garma dEvEṣvasi|rOciṣIyAham̍ manuṣyE̍ṣu||samrA̱ḍ̍ Garma rucitastvaM EvEṣvAyuṣmAṅstEjasvI̍ brahmavarcasya̍si|rucitO̍&ham̍ manuṣyE̱ṣvAyu̍ṣmAṅ-stEjasvI̍ brahmavarcasI̍ BUyAsam||ruga̍si|rucam̍ mayi# dhEhi ( )|20 (10)

Urddhvamima-maddhvara~gkRu̍dhi|divi̍ dEvEṣu hOtrA# yacCa||viśvAsAm̍ BuvAm patE|viśvasya̍ BuvanaspatE|viśvasya̍ manasaspatE|viśvasya̍ vacasaspatE|viśvasya̍ tapasaspatE|viśvasya̍ brahmaṇaspatE|dEvaśrUstvandEva̍ Garma dEvAn pAhi||tapOjAM̍ ~MvAcamasmE̍ niyacCa̍ dEvAyuva̱m

adityA̍ uṣṇIṣamasi|vAyura̍syaiḍaḥ|pUṣA̍ tvOpAvasRujatu|aśviByAm̍ pra dApaya|yastE̍ stanaḥ̍ śaśayO yO mayOBUḥ|yEna̍ viśvA puṣyasi̍ vAryAṇi|yO̍ ratnadhA̍ vasuvidyaḥ̍ sudatraḥ|sara̍svati̍ tamiha dhAtavE&kaḥ||usra̍# Garmaṃ śiṃṣa|usra̍# Garmam pAhi|28̍ (10)

bRuhaspatayE̍ tvA viśvadE̱vyAvatE svAhA̱|savitrE tvarBumatE̍# viBumatE̱ praBumatE vAjavatE̍ svAhA̱|yamAya tvA&~ggirasvatE̍ pitRumatE svAhA̱||viśvA AśA# dakṣiṇasat|viśvA̱n dEvAnayAḍiha|svAhA̍kRutasya̍ Garmasya|madhO̱ḥ̍ pibatamaśvinA|svAhA&gnayE# yajñiyAya|śaM̍ ~MyajurBiḥ||aśvi̍nA̍ Garmam pAtaṃ̍ hArdivAnam|33 (10)
